dialogue.dialogueText: Owner of this bar, Beth Anne, knows everyone in town.
Howdy there! what brings a girl like you to a town like this?
Sure I might... you look a little thirsty though.
Hmmm theres a family who live on a farm up north who was having some trouble with a local gang, not sure how much they can pay but they're decent folk
That cursed gang shot up my husband, all over some stupid land, I'd go out there and get revenge if I didn't have a family to look after.
Luckily he's hanging on, I'm not too worried though he's a tough one.
Elyse, I'm Martha Jean, be careful out there.
You'll find them in these hills to the East, cross a rickety old bridge, feel free to grab any supplies you need from inside.
Well, well, well, what do we have here. Heard you scheming against my gang with Martha up there.
Heh, you got a quick tongue but how quick are you with that colt?
An attitude like that will get you in trouble missy.
